title.romaji: Shakugan no Shana Special: Koi to Onsen no Kougai Gakushuu!
title.english: Shakugan no Shana: Koi to Onsen no Kougai Gakushuu!
title.native: 灼眼のシャナ 特別編 恋と温泉の校外学習！

description: Yuji and Shana's class go on a trip to see various temples and shrines, followed by a trip to a hot springs resort. During the trip, Matake Ogata tries to tell Eita Tanaka her feelings for him, but various complications and hijinks occur that prevent her from doing so.
